description: AWS::PCS::Cluster resource creates an AWS PCS cluster.

AuthKey.description: The shared Slurm key for authentication, also known as the cluster secret.

SecretArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the the shared Slurm key.
SecretArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the the shared Slurm key.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Endpoint.description: An endpoint available for interaction with the scheduler.

Allowed Values: SLURMCTLD | SLURMDBD

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: No

Read only property: Yes

Name.description: The name that identifies the cluster.

Type: String

Networking.description: The networking configuration for the cluster's control plane.

SecurityGroupIds.description: The list of security group IDs associated with the Elastic Network Interface (ENI) created in subnets.
SecurityGroupIds.markdownDescription:
The list of security group IDs associated with the Elastic Network Interface (ENI) created in subnets.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

SubnetIds.description: The list of subnet IDs where AWS PCS creates an Elastic Network Interface (ENI) to enable communication between managed controllers and AWS PCS resources. The subnet must have an available IP address, cannot reside in AWS Outposts, AWS Wavelength, or an AWS Local Zone. AWS PCS currently supports only 1 subnet in this list.
SubnetIds.markdownDescription:
The list of subnet IDs where AWS PCS creates an Elastic Network Interface (ENI) to enable communication between managed controllers and AWS PCS resources. The subnet must have an available IP address, cannot reside in AWS Outposts, AWS Wavelength, or an AWS Local Zone. AWS PCS currently supports only 1 subnet in this list.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Networking.markdownDescription:
The networking configuration for the cluster's control plane.

Required: Yes  
Update requires: Replacement

Scheduler.description: The cluster management and job scheduling software associated with the cluster.

Type.description: The software AWS PCS uses to manage cluster scaling and job scheduling.
Type.markdownDescription:
The software AWS PCS uses to manage cluster scaling and job scheduling.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SLURM  
Update requires: No interruption

Version.description: The version of the specified scheduling software that AWS PCS uses to manage cluster scaling and job scheduling.

The version of the specified scheduling software that AWS PCS uses to manage cluster scaling and job scheduling.

Update requires: No interruption

Update requires: Replacement

Size.markdownDescription:
The size of the cluster.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SMALL | MEDIUM | LARGE  
Update requires: Replacement

Status.description: The provisioning status of the cluster. The provisioning status doesn't indicate the overall health of the cluster.

The provisioning status of the cluster. The provisioning status doesn't indicate the overall health of the cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CREATING | ACTIVE | UPDATING | DELETING | CREATE_FAILED | DELETE_FAILED | UPDATE_FAILED  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes
